subject: Compliments of the season!!! W
body:
Compliments of the season!!! Why Are American Troops Still in Iraq and Syria? view the website for more details below.  My name is Staff Sergeant William Ronald Lance American soldier, currently serving in Iraq providing adequate security for the US embassy in Baghdad. I'm seeking your kind assistance to move some money we discovered in Saddam's old palaces in Tikrit-Iraq during a rescue operation, full details will follow if you are interested.
I wait your reply as to proceed immediately,
God bless you and America.
Best Regards,
Staff Sergeant William Ronald Lance.
United States Soldier Presently in Syria.

subject: Re: Compliments of the season!!! W
body:
Hello Staff Sergeant William Ronald Lance,

It's a pleasure to hear from you. I hope you're doing well in Syria. Your job sounds very interesting and challenging, especially being in such a historical place like Saddam's old palaces.

I'm intrigued by your message about the money discovered during the rescue operation. Could you please provide more details about this? How did you come across it and what are your plans for it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Dear William.
body:
Dear William.

I confirm the receipt of your mail and the content is well understood and
noted. Be rest assured that this project is 100% risk free. There is no
trouble because I did my homework very well. Before we proceed let me take
a little time to explain the origin of these funds and why I am sending
them to you.

During our war campaign then in Iraq, my team was responsible for a lot of
raids on Saddam (Iraqi former president) palaces, while on raid, we
discovered the sum of $140 Million dollars packed into military trunk boxes
and hidden in Saddam's underground secret chambers.

Honestly, my first instinct was to report this to the command officer but
on second thought, I have sacrificed years to serve and protect my great
country, most of us have lost friends and loved ones while on duty. I have
been married twice of which none ever lasted for up to 3yrs due to the
nature of my job. The most painful one is My 16yr old son turned into a
drug addict as he lacked parental guidance and eventually died of an
overdose. I can't begin to mention all my sacrifices and losses.

This is a fortune for both of us hence, the funds belonged to an ex-tyrant
whom we captured and has been executed by the International Court of
Justice. As the leader of my unit I reported the sum of $120 million
dollars out of the funds discovered and I will use my position to move the
remaining (US$20 million dollars) to you for safekeeping until after my
assignment and retirement.

The boxes will be sent as Swift Military Consignment/Courier specially with
immunity to deliver to your physical mailing address. It will be done this
way to ensure maximum security. I must assure you that you will benefit
very much and you will never regret assisting me, I have already made solid
plans to ensure that this deal is 100% untraceable.

Your efforts and assistance will be rewarded with 40% of the money if you
are able to handle this deal and keep the boxes safe until I return to the
U.S. and move to your home contact. I will take care of shipping expenses
including insurance. However, once I conclude with the delivery company
that will nominate their agent who will make the delivery to your country,
I will update you of the delivery itinerary.

Henceforth, further correspondence should strictly be directed to this
email ID for security reasons. Nevertheless, re-confirm the following to me
as follows before the final departure of trunks as clearly stated above.

(a) Your full Names:
(b) Your physical mailing address:
(c) Your direct telephone numbers:
(d) Your occupation:

Thanks for your cooperation, God bless you and America!!
Best Regards,
Staff Sergeant Williams Ronald Lance.
United States Soldier Presently in Syria.

subject: Re: Dear William.
body:
Hello Staff Sergeant Williams Ronald Lance,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's quite an intriguing story, I must say! I can't even begin to imagine the things you've seen and experienced during your service. 

I'm sorry to hear about the losses you've suffered, especially your son. That must have been incredibly hard for you.

Regarding the funds, it's a lot to take in. You mentioned that this project is risk-free, but could you explain a bit more about how this process works? How does the Swift Military Courier system operate? And what kind of security measures are in place?

Also, I'm curious about why you chose me for this task. We don't know each other personally, so it's a bit surprising that you'd trust me with such an important responsibility.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Further Clarification.
body:
Dear William.

Your email is received and noted hence, I believe I have explained
extensively over the nature and the modalities about the Two Trunks and I
shall appreciate for us to proceed further, you are advised to send the
below details to ensure that the Trunks are registered for onward delivery
without any delay. I have taken my time before I contacted you and I know
you are worthy to receive the Trunks on my behalf therefore, I want us to
work with trust and sincerity until the completion.

Be informed that I will take care of the delivery and insurance fee paid
and the Trunks shall be registered as a Swift Military Consignment with
immunity to be delivered preventing any stoppage nor scanning until when
received by you in person. I look forward to your email with the below
details to ensure that the Trunks are registered for onward delivery to you
without any hindrance.

(a) Your full Names:
(b) Your physical mailing address:
(c) Your direct telephone numbers:
(d) Your occupation.
(e) A copy of your ID.

Thanks for your cooperation, God bless you and America !!
Best Regards,
Staff Sergeant Williams Ronald Lance.
United States Soldier Presently in Syria.

subject: Re: Further Clarification.
body:
Hello Staff Sergeant Williams Ronald Lance,

Thank you for your email and the trust you have placed in me. I am truly humbled by your gesture. It's not every day that one gets an opportunity to assist a brave soldier like yourself.

I'm curious about these trunks, though. Could you tell me more about them? What do they contain? And why is it so important that they are delivered without any stoppage or scanning?

Also, I'd love to know more about your experiences in Syria. How long have you been stationed there? Is it difficult being so far away from home?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Further Clarification.
body:
Dear Staff Sergeant Williams Ronald Lance,

Thank you for your email and the trust you have placed in me. I am truly humbled by your gesture. It's not every day that one gets an opportunity to assist a soldier serving our country.

I'm curious about these trunks, though. Could you tell me more about them? What do they contain? And why is it so important that they are delivered without any stoppage or scanning?

As for the details you asked for, I'm afraid I can't provide them at this time. You see, I've been advised to be cautious when sharing personal information online due to potential risks involved. But don't worry, we can still continue our conversation and find another way to proceed with this matter.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William
